description:
Display contextually relevant suggestions in empty states based on current date, upcoming events, or organizational calendar (e.g., 'Prepare briefs for upcoming UN General Assembly', 'Review annual bilateral commitments').

**Rationale:** Generic empty states feel static and irrelevant. Time-aware prompts demonstrate system intelligence and help users proactively prepare for upcoming needs, increasing perceived value.
title: Seasonal and Event-Based Empty State Prompts
